title: Sweet Pain
description: Monsters can’t hide in the light.Willow Chase and Ryker Penn have fought through hell. Separately and together. All they want now is to build a life they can be proud of. And to prove that friends are the family they choose for themselves.But when they discover the real monsters are closer than they thought, they face their biggest challenge yet. When bringing those responsible to justice means shining a light on their own personal hells, will they be able to weather the spotlight? Or will they remain in the shadows for their own protection?Don’t miss the thrilling end to Willow and Ryker’s story in Sweet Pain, Amatucci Family series book three. If you like survivors who are willing to put everything on the line, possessive males, jealous females, and even action to have you holding your breath, then go pick up your copy today!
author: Sadie Jacks
